articles.description: Liverpool face Lille in the Champions League - follow stats and updates.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-1 Lille: Reds secure last-16 place with victory over 10-man French side

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says hugging coach Andy Murray after beating Carlos Alcaraz in the Australian Open last eight was a "gesture of appreciation".
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Novak Djokovic 'grateful' for coach Andy Murray after beating Carlos Alcaraz in Melbourne

articles.description: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery says his side may have squandered their chances of finishing in the top eight of the Champions League following their loss at Monaco.
articles.title: Emery fears for Aston Villa's Champions League top-eight chances

articles.description: A 17-year-old boy from St Albans is arrested on suspicion of sending online abuse to Arsenal striker Kai Havertz and his wife.
articles.title: Kai Havertz: Teenage boy arrested on suspicion of sending online abuse to Arsenal striker and wife

articles.description: Alex Hartley says she has been "hung out to dry" and snubbed by England players over her comments about the team's fitness.
articles.title: Alex Hartley given 'cold shoulder' by England over fitness comment

articles.description: Barcelona twice fight back from two goals down - and two Wojciech Szczesny howlers - to snatch a dramatic victory at Benfica.
articles.title: Benfica 4-5 Barcelona: Raphinha hits 96th minute winner

articles.description: Captain Maro Itoje says England can shrug off their poor recent form and deliver a surprise Six Nations Grand Slam.
articles.title: Maro Itoje: England can beat everyone in Six Nations

articles.description: Erling Haaland says he is "confident" Manchester City know what they are doing over the charges they face after signing a new long-term deal.
articles.title: Erling Haaland: Man City charges had no bearing on signing new deal

articles.description: England's match against Afghanistan at the Champions Trophy next month should go ahead despite calls for a boycott, says captain Jos Buttler.
articles.title: England v Afghanistan: Boycott not the way to go, says captain Jos Buttler

articles.description: Atletico Madrid fight back to secure a remarkable Champions League win over Bayer Leverkusen despite playing with only 10 men for 65 minutes.
articles.title: Atlético Madrid 2-1 Bayer Leverkusen: Ten-man Atletico fight back to move third in Uefa Champions League table
